short_summary: Hosting of electronic PEC Site legal and remediation records database
description: This procurement is for the hosting and management of the Pacific Environment Centre legal records database. The contract will run for a minimum of 1 year with an option to extend for up to 4 additional one-year periods.
full_summary:
# **Tender Announcement**
## **Hosting of Electronic PEC Site Legal and Remediation Records Database**
## **Solicitation Number:** 5000076231
### **Description:**
The Department of Environment and Climate Change Canada invites proposals for the hosting and maintenance of the Pacific Environment Centre (PEC) Site legal and remediation records e-Discovery database.

**Period of the Contract:** 
The contract term will be from the date of contract award to March 31, 2025, with an option to extend for up to four one-year periods under the same conditions.

**Security Requirements:**
The requirement is subject to certain security requirements. Suppliers are encouraged to consult part 6 of the bid solicitation documents for further information on security requirements.

**Service Requirements:**
Suppliers must provide a list of names and other relevant information as required by section 01 of the bidding instructions.

**Trade Agreements:**
This contract is subject to trade agreements including but not limited to:

* The Canadian Free Trade Agreement
* The Canada–Chile Free Trade Agreement
* The Canada–Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Business Goals and Diversity Targets:**
The Government of Canada is actively working to increase the participation of businesses from under-represented groups in government procurement opportunities.

**Intersted Suppliers:**
If you are interested in suiting this opportunity, please contact the Contracting Officer Megan Filliol at megan.filliol@ec.gc.ca.
